Class - XPSPL\Signal¶

As of v0.3.0 the default signal object allows for signals of only strings and integers.

Other signal types are considered “complex” and use the XPSPLsignalComplex object.

Methods¶

__construct¶

__construct([$info = false])¶

Constructs a new signal.

Parameters:string|integer – Signal information
Return type:void
